nodes.text: The Wistril system was a star system located within the Fath sector of the Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Wistril.

Grand Admiral Thrawn and Captain Pellaeon stopped the Chimaera in the Wistril system to take on supplies, and inadvertently took on Mara Jade and Luke Skywalker as well, who rescued Talon Karrde from their clutches.
